src:
【新車登場】猛獸再進化--NEW JAGUAR XE預告台北車展發表
06 Nov 2019, 14:56 by 鞠豪傑 Jet Chu
Jaguar Land Rover Taiwan台灣捷豹路虎宣佈Jaguar全新改款四門性能轎跑 – New Jaguar XE即日起啟動預售方案，20年式車系編成包含P300 R-Dynamic SE以及P250 R-Dynamic SE兩款運動化車型，建議預售價分別為239與 219萬元起。


Jaguar XE車系領先級距的操控性能，源自F-TYPE純種跑車賽道基因。

New Jaguar XE完美承襲F-TYPE純種跑車賽道基因，無可錯認的英國跑車造型輪廓，透過全新設計流線型LED頭、尾燈組與R-Dynamic專屬前、後空力套件，進一步強化其視覺張力與高科技性能跑格。全面革新進化的跑車式座艙，延續Jaguar引以為傲的細膩工藝與頂級材質鋪陳，大量採用質感冷冽的鋁合金飾板，搭配黑色頂篷強化運動化氛圍，展現簡約俐落的當代英倫風格。


20年式全新改款導入2.0L Ingenium四缸渦輪增壓汽油引擎300PS與250PS兩款高效能動力選項。

全新改款New Jaguar XE搭載Jaguar最新世代科技配備，同時大量導入F-TYPE與I-PACE設計元素，直覺化操控大幅強化人車聯結駕馭感受。全新SportShift Gear Selector跑車式排檔桿與 JaguarDrive Control駕馭控制系統介面源自F-TYPE設計。最新世代12.3 吋高解析互動式數位儀錶板、Touch Pro Duo智慧多媒體雙觸控中控台顯示幕、全新造型電容式多功能跑車方向盤等前衛科技配備，則出自I-PACE純電跑車型SUV設計，先進科技與工藝質感凌駕同級距豪華轎跑。


New Jaguar XE 擁有革新進化的跑車式座艙，延續Jaguar引以為傲的細膩工藝與頂級材質鋪陳。

New Jaguar XE廣受全球專業媒體高度評價的精準操控性能，奠基於輕盈強韌的航太工法鋁合金車體結構，全車高達82%以鋁合金材質打造，兼具輕量化與高剛性雙重優勢；懸吊系統採用全鋁合金前雙A臂與後多連桿懸吊系統配置，搭配全新SportShift Gear Selector跑車式排檔桿與JaguarDrive Control駕馭控制系統，實現如同跑車般的敏銳操控與駕馭樂趣。


大量採用質感冷冽的鋁合金飾板，搭配黑色頂篷強化運動化氛圍，展現簡約俐落的當代英倫風格。

Jaguar將駕乘者的行車安全與便利列為首要考量，全新改款New Jaguar XE全車系升級標配自動停車輔助系統與更加完備的主動安全防護系統，包含AEB 高速自動煞車輔助系統、BSA盲點偵測輔助系統、LKA車道維持輔助系統，與ACC主動式定速含車流排隊輔助功能等先進配備，同時提供級距獨創之ClearSight車內後視鏡選配功能，能透過安裝於車頂天線之隱藏式攝影機切換後視鏡顯示畫面，即使後座滿載乘員或行李，仍能提供毫無障礙的廣角清晰視野，高度確保行駛安全。


全新改款New Jaguar XE預計12月份於2020台北國際車展正式發表。


New Jaguar XE預售方案
XE P250 R-Dynamic SE：建議售價219 萬元起
XE P300 R-Dynamic SE：建議售價239萬元起
※全車系同享0負擔5年原廠保養專案

更新時間｜2019.11.06 15:19
text:
[New car debut] Beast evolved again - NEW JAGUAR XE announces the Taipei Auto Show
06 Nov 2019, 14:56 by 鞠豪杰 Jet Chu
Jaguar Land Rover Taiwan Jaguar Land Rover announces Jaguar's new four-door performance coupe – New Jaguar XE starts the pre-sale program today, and the 20-year-old car is composed of P300 R-Dynamic SE and P250 R-Dynamic SE. For models, the pre-sale price is 239 and 2.19 million yuan respectively.


The Jaguar XE's leading-edge handling capability is derived from the F-TYPE purebred sports car track gene.

New Jaguar XE perfectly inherits the F-TYPE purebred sports car track gene, the unmistakable British sports car silhouette, further enhances its visual tension through the newly designed streamlined LED head, taillights and R-Dynamic exclusive front and rear air force kits. Run with high-tech performance. Fully innovative and evolutionary sports car cockpit, continuation of Jaguar's proud craftsmanship and top-quality materials, a large number of cool aluminum alloy plaques, with a black canopy to enhance the sporty atmosphere, showing a simple and degenerate contemporary British style .


The new 20-year model introduces the 2.0L Ingenium four-cylinder turbocharged petrol engine with 300PS and 250PS high-performance power options.

The new Jaguar XE is equipped with Jaguar's latest generation of technology, and a large number of F-TYPE and I-PACE design elements are introduced. Intuitive control greatly enhances the connection between the car and the driver. The new SportShift Gear Selector sports car gearshift lever and JaguarDrive Control control system interface are derived from the F-TYPE design. The latest generation 12.3 吋 high-resolution interactive digital instrument panel, Touch Pro Duo intelligent multimedia dual-touch center console display screen, new modeling capacitive multi-function sports car steering wheel and other avant-garde technology, from the I-PACE pure electric running model SUV design The advanced technology and craft quality are superior to the luxury car in the same class.


The new Jaguar XE has an innovative and evolutionary sports car cockpit that continues Jaguar's proud craftsmanship and top-quality materials.

New Jaguar XE is highly praised by the global professional media for its precise handling performance. It is based on the lightweight and strong aerospace aluminum alloy body structure. The car is up to 82% made of aluminum alloy, which has the advantages of light weight and high rigidity. The suspension system is equipped with all-aluminum front double A-arm and rear multi-link suspension system. It is equipped with the new SportShift Gear Selector and JaguarDrive Control control system to achieve the keen control and driving pleasure.


A large number of cool aluminum alloy plaques, with a black canopy to enhance the sporty atmosphere, showing a simple and degenerate contemporary British style.

Jaguar puts the driver's safety and convenience as the top priority. The new Jaguar XE upgrades the standard automatic parking assist system and a more complete active safety protection system, including AEB high-speed automatic brake assist system and BSA blind spot detection. Advanced auxiliary equipment such as auxiliary auxiliary system, LKA lane maintenance auxiliary system, and ACC active fixed speed including traffic queue assist function, while providing the original Clearview interior rearview mirror option, which can be hidden by the roof antenna. The camera switches the rear view mirror display, providing a clear, wide-angle view with no obstacles even when the rear seat is fully loaded with occupants or luggage, ensuring safe driving.


The new redesigned New Jaguar XE is expected to be officially released at the 2020 Taipei International Auto Show in December.


New Jaguar XE Pre-sales Solution
XE P250 R-Dynamic SE: The recommended price is from 2.19 million yuan
XE P300 R-Dynamic SE: Recommended price starting from 2.39 million yuan
※All car ownership share 0 burden 5 years original maintenance project

Update time |2019.11.06 15:19
